div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 545px; margin-left: 163px;

div.div:
VirtualService
gateways:
- knative-serving/knative-ingress-gateway
- knative-serving/knative-local-gateway
hosts:- myservice-my-app.apps.serverless.devcluster.openshift.com
- myservice.my-app
- myservice.my-app.svc
- myservice.my-app.svc.cluster.local
